articles.author: Ellen Francis
articles.title: White House clash ups pressure on Europe to aid Ukraine without U.S. - The Washington Post
articles.description: European leaders rallied around Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky after the brawl with President Donald Trump. But arming Kyiv alone would be a struggle.
articles.content: BRUSSELS For Kyivs European allies, the shouting match in the Oval Office has intensified the pressure to fill gaps in U.S. military aid and face up to whether they can go it alone in arming Ukraine.… [+7985 chars]
